name: Asteroids (itch) (Delta Raider)
description:
USE W,A,D KEYS TO MOVE AND SPACE TO SHOOT

Asteroids is a game that focuses on destroying asteroids. Once you kill large asteroids, the break into smaller asteroids. Once you kill the smallest asteroids, they disappear, and then you can rack up points. Try to get more points than your friends! Get to the highest level! What that level is I wont tell you >:D

-Delta
